availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob Stewart (Henry County, Kentucky, hatter and laborer.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, hatter and laborer. Pennsylvania native. Married to Lucy Stewart. Father of Mary Stewart, Martin Stuart, Charles Stuart, Merrit Stuart, and Jacob Stewart. Hatter in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District No. 1, p. 396B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 242.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District of New Castle, p. 330A.
"Jacob Stewart (1800-1873)," Find A Grave, Memorial #90108718, Accessed July 21, 2022, findagrave.com/memorial/90108718/jacob-stewart.
